post.body:
OpenConnect server(ocserv) 一键脚本 for deibian 7+
apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y
wget http://git.io/p9r8 --no-check-certificate -O ocservauto.sh && bash ocservauto.sh
wget git.io/ocservauto -O- --no-check-certificate|bash -
 

shadowsocks-libev一键安装脚本
Debian/Ubuntu
wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocks-libev-debian.sh
chmod +x shadowsocks-libev-debian.sh
./shadowsocks-libev-debian.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocks-libev-debian.log

./shadowsocks-libev-debian.sh uninstall

使用命令：
启动：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks start
停止：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks stop
重启：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks restart
状态：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks status


wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocksR.sh
chmod +x shadowsocksR.sh
./shadowsocksR.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocksR.log
./shadowsocksR.sh uninstall

vi /etc/shadowsocks.json
启动：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks start
停止：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks stop
重启：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks restart
状态：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks status

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install g++ make binutils autoconf automake autotools-dev libtool pkg-config \
  zlib1g-dev libcunit1-dev libssl-dev libxml2-dev libev-dev libevent-dev libjansson-dev \
  libjemalloc-dev cython python3-dev python-setuptools


安装spdylay
wget 'https://github.com/tatsuhiro-t/spdylay/releases/download/v1.4.0/spdylay-1.4.0.tar.xz'
tar xpf spdylay-1.4.0.tar.xz && cd spdylay-1.4.0 && ./configure
make && make install
ldconfig


安装nghttp2
apt-get install libev-dev libjansson-dev libjemalloc-dev python-dev cython

wget https://github.com/nghttp2/nghttp2/releases/download/v1.15.0/nghttp2-1.15.0.tar.xz && tar xpf nghttp2-1.15.0.tar.xz && cd nghttp2-1.15.0 && ./configure
make && make install
ldconfig

安装squid 3.5.12
sudo apt-get install squid
Squid的配置文件是/etc/squid/squid.conf

vi /etc/squid/squid.conf


touch /etc/squid/passwd
htpasswd -m /etc/squid/passwd lolo  #squid 不支持MD5验证

1.增加用户
htpasswd  /etc/squid/user.pass lookwest
2.修改用户密码：
htpasswd -d /etc/squid/user.pass lookwest
3.删除用户：
htpasswd -D /etc/squid/user.pass lookwest


安装supervisor
sudo apt-get install supervisor
配置文件
vi /etc/supervisor/supervisord.conf



配置nghttpx


nghttpx -s -D --conf=/root/nghttp2-1.4.0/nghttpx.conf /root/certs/www_56789u_com.key /root/certs/www_56789u_com.crt

pkill nghttpx



配置supervisor
vi /etc/supervisor/supervisord.conf

[program:nghttpx]
command=nghttpx -s -D --conf=/root/nghttp2-1.4.0/nghttpx.conf /root/certs/www_56789u_com.key /root/certs/www_56789u_com.crt
autorestart=true
user=root

wget 'https://github.com/haproxy/haproxy/archive/v1.7-dev3.tar.gz'
tar zxvf v1.7-dev3.tar.gz
cd haproxy-1.7-dev3
make TARGET=linux2628 PREFIX=/usr/local/haproxy
make install PREFIX=/usr/local/haproxy

vi /usr/local/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

/usr/local/haproxy/sbin/haproxy -f /usr/local/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

vi /etc/rc.local，在文档最后添加：
/usr/local/haproxy/sbin/haproxy -f /usr/local/haproxy/haproxy.cfg



global
    ulimit-n    51200
    log         127.0.0.1 local2
    chroot      /var/lib/haproxy
    pidfile     /var/run/haproxy.pid
    user        haproxy
    group       haproxy
    daemon

defaults
    mode                    tcp
    log                     global
    option                  dontlognull
    timeout connect         5s
    timeout client          1m
    timeout server          1m

frontend ss-443
        bind *:443
        default_backend ss-443
backend ss-443
        server server1 远端服务器地址:443 maxconn 20480

windows端口映射

netsh interface portproxy add v4tov4 8080 192.168.11.1 80
netsh interface portproxy delete v4tov4 listenport=8080

cd c:\lolo
youtube-dl.exe --proxy localhost:1080 -f bestvideo+bestaudio ""

c:\lolo目录内放置ffmpeg.exe

you-get -i 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jNQXAC9IVRw'
you-get --itag=18 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jNQXAC9IVRw'
you-get -x 127.0.0.1:8087 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jNQXAC9IVRw'

you-get -i 'http://www.panda.tv/s6'
